## âœ… Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have run E2E tests and they pass

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the UPGRADE_GUIDE.md if needed
- [ ] I have updated the README.md if needed

### Firebase/Backend
- [ ] I have updated Firestore security rules if needed
- [ ] I have tested with Firebase emulator locally
- [ ] Database schema changes are backward compatible

### Security
- [ ] No sensitive data (API keys, passwords) is committed
- [ ] I have reviewed security implications of my changes
- [ ] User input is properly validated and sanitized
